short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Christmas Decorations Wallpaper turn new tab to custom Christmas Decorations background. Christmas Decorations wallpaper for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Christmas Decorations wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Christmas Decorations background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Search Bar using Google.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Christmas Decorations new tab.
